snippet.title: Pokemon Tectonic — Fangame Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Pokemon Tectonic is a fan game set in the Makya region whose Beta is launching January 13th, and whose full release is expected August of 2023.

Features
40 hours of content
Pokemon through generation 8, plus 40 new species
The MasterDex: Searchable in-game encyclopedia
Hundreds of new moves and abilities
“Avatar battles” pose unique challenges
The most ambitious Pokemon rebalance ever
Streamlined progression and QOL features
Fully fleshed-out out main story and NPC questlines

Links:
tectonic-game.com
discord.gg/J3r7zRaMvP

Find us on RelicCastle or PokeCommunity forums!

Song Used
"Past Meets Present" by Tikaal (OCRemix)
